workspace.name: 2c-exercises-mlw17
workspace.query: SELECT * FROM ECommerce2.Order l, ECommerce2.Order_orderLines ol WHERE l.id = ol.id ORDER BY l.id, paymentTerms, quantity

import module namespace op = "http://marklogic.com/optic" at "/MarkLogic/optic.xqy";
op:from-view("SYS", "SYS_TABLES") =>op:where(op:eq(op:col("schema"), "ECommerce3")) =>op:result()

import module namespace op = "http://marklogic.com/optic" at "/MarkLogic/optic.xqy";
op:from-view("SYS", "SYS_COLUMNS") =>op:where(op:eq(op:col("schema"), "ECommerce3")) =>op:where(op:eq(op:col("table"), "Order_orderLines")) =>op:result()
